The Foster

Dark Horn | Polarised Lenses

An iconic style featuring both character and cheek. With its refined points and gentle lines the Foster makes for a subtle yet captivating frame.

Dark anthracite base featuring subtle striations of pale yellow, brown, and other warm tones.

The Foster

Light Horn | Polarised Lenses

An iconic style featuring both character and cheek. With its refined points and gentle lines the Foster makes for a subtle yet captivating frame.

Distinctive but harmonious striations of pale yellow, brown, and other warm tones.

The Foster

Yellow Horn | Polarised Lenses

An iconic style featuring both character and cheek. With its refined points and gentle lines the Foster makes for a subtle yet captivating frame.

A consistent light semi-transparent yellow with the occasional tinge of rose.
